text: Badausa is a town in Uttar Pradesh, India. It comes under Chitrakoot Division, Banda District and Atarra tehsil of Uttar Pradesh. The PIN code of Badausa is 210202.The river Bagain passes through Badausa. It has a railway station, Allahabad Bank and Intermediate college. It also has a police station. It lies along Jhansi-Prayagraj NH35. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Banda district, India
title: Badausa, Uttar Pradesh
